column5: Combine fashion industry expertise with transferrable business and marketing skills with this specialist MSc course.Fashion is an exciting and fast paced industry and consumer demands are evolving all the time. This course will give you an in depth understanding of marketing theory and principles, with a special focus on the challenges and dynamics of the international fashion sector.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time, 2 years full time with year in industry
